quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Cat Stevens
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Cat Stevens wrote a new musical arrangement for the hymn, Morning Has Broken. Who wrote the lyrics?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eleanor Farjeon

questions.question: What is the rest of the verse from Madonnas song Express Yourself: What you need is a big strong hand to lift you to your higher ground. Make you feel like ...?

options.text: Youre the only woman in the world

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A queen on a throne

questions.question: How old was Cat Stevens when he started his music career?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 17

questions.question: In 1978, Cat Stevens converted to Islam, and changed his name to Yusuf Islam. Did he approve of the 9/11 attacks on the US?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Finish the lyric from Madonnas song Beautiful Stranger: I looked into your eyes and my world came tumbling down. Youre ..., thats why Im singing this song to you?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The devil in disguise

questions.question: What word is missing from the verse of Madonnas song Take A Bow: When you get to the part where youre breaking my heart, hide behind your smile, all the world loves ...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A clown

questions.question: Complete the title of this song by Cat Stevens: 18th Avenue (________ Nightmare)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kansas City

questions.question: In what country did musician Cat Stevens grow up?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Great Britain

questions.question: Finish the missing words from the song Papa Dont Preach by Madonna: But my friends keep telling me to give it up, saying Im too young, I ought to live it up. What I need right now is ....
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Some good advice

questions.question: Complete the lyric from Madonnas song You Must Love Me: Deep in my heart Im concealing things that Im longing to say, scared to confess what Im feeling, frightened youll ....
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Slip away

questions.question: Cat Stevens song If You Want to Sing Out, Sing Out first appeared in what 1971 film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harold and Maude

questions.question: Cat Stevens allegedly wrote the song Wild World for this actress.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Patti DArbanville

questions.question: Which of these artists has NOT recorded a cover version of Cat Stevens song The First Cut is the Deepest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barry White

questions.question: Cat Stevens first album was titled Tea for the Tillerman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is missing from these lyrics from the song Ray Of Light by Madonna: Shes got herself a universe gone quickly for the call of ... threatens everyone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thunder

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Marni Nixon and Singing
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, nixon, shows. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Marni Nixon did all the singing of which character in the film version of  West Side Story?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maria

questions.question: In the original version of The Secret Garden singer Marni Nixon did her first  off-screen singing voice. She dubbed the singing voice of which famous actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Margaret OBrien

questions.question: For which star did Marni Nixon do the off screen singing voice in The King and I in 1956?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deborah Kerr

questions.question: Which one of these famous actresses never had her singing voice dubbed by Marni Nixon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ginger Rodgers

questions.question: What 1941 song is considered Ernest Tubbs biggest hit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walking the Floor Over You

questions.question: In which of these popular TV shows did singer Marni Nixon have an acting role?

options.text: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit

questions.question: Which statement about Marni Nixons birth is true?

options.text: She was born Margaret Buxtehude in February 1947.
She was born Margaret McEasthron in February 1950.
She was born Marni McEasthron in February 1930.
She was born Marni Nixon in February 1940.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was born Marni McEasthron in February 1930.

questions.question: Complete the lyrics from Madonnas song Die Another Day: Im gonna break the cycle. Im gonna shake up the system. Im gonna destroy ... Im gonna close my body now?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My ego

questions.question: What role did Marni Nixon have in the movie The Sound of Music?

options.text: She did the singing voice for two of the daughters.
She played and sang the role of Sister Sophia.
She sand Julie Andrews  role of Maria.
She had no role in the  movie.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She played and sang the role of Sister Sophia.

questions.question: Finish the missing part from the verse of Madonnas song Secret: You gave me back the ... that I thought I lost for good.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paradise

questions.question: In the 1957 movie An Affair to Remember Marni Nixon did the singing for which actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deborah Kerr

questions.question: What character did Marni Nixon voice in the 1964 musical film Mary Poppins?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The three geese

questions.question: The song I Could Have Danced All Night, that was voted  #17 in AFIs list of the top movie songs, was dubbed by Marni Nixon for what actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Audrey Hepburn

questions.question: Finish the lyrics from Madonnas American Life: I tried to be a boy, tried to be a girl, tried to be ..., tried to be the best, tried to find a friend, tried to stay ahead.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A mess

questions.question: What is missing from theses lyrics from Madonnas song Nothing Really Matters: I realized that ... Something is ending, and something begins?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nobody wins

on papyrus or tanned sheep/cow skin
